## At a Glance

Prep: 15 mins
Additional: 1 hr
Total: 1 hr 15 mins
Servings: 24
Yield: 2 dozen bites

Nutrition / serving: 93.8 calories; 2.5 g protein; 10.6 g carbohydrates; 0 mg cholesterol; 27.9 mg sodium. 

## Ingredients

1 cup oats, rolled, regular, dry
½ cup miniature semisweet chocolate chips
½ cup Seeds, Flax seed
½ cup Peanut butter, chunk style, with salt
⅓ cup Honey, strained or extracted
1 teaspoon Vanilla extract


## Instructions

1. Combine oats, chocolate chips, flax seed, peanut butter, honey, and vanilla extract together in a bowl; form into balls using your hands. Arrange energy bites on a baking sheet and freeze until set, about 1 hour.

## Lisa's notes

Heavily modified this was also good: Removed flax, used tahini and added dates. Some more oats for consistency.
